message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DC, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NE. 

The paper proposes a communication-efficient decentralized deep learning algorithm, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The algorithm involves communication between workers, which suggests a distributed computing aspect, placing it under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The use of deep neural networks and optimization techniques places it under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The algorithm involves adjusting the communication periods for different layers, which suggests a control systems aspect, placing it under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the use of stochastic optimization techniques places it under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
